description: Transform client outcomes into compelling impact stories for reporting.

body.content: Write an impact narrative for SBDC reporting.

body.label: SBDC Services

body.label: Client Quote

body.content:
Please write:

1. Impact Summary (100 words) — suitable for SBA reports, factual and metrics-focused
2. Success Story (250 words) — suitable for newsletters or marketing, with a human angle
3. Key Metrics to Highlight — the most impressive numbers, formatted for quick scanning
4. Headline Options (3) — compelling headlines for this story

Use professional tone appropriate for SBA reporting while making the human impact clear. Use 'no-fee' instead of 'free' when describing SBDC services.
